title: String & binary functions | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This family of functions perform operations on a string input value, or binary input value (for certain functions), and return a string or numeric value.
The functions are grouped by type of operation performed.
Provides partial support for collation. For details, see the documentation of the function.
